Parameter.name: XMLTYPE
Parameter.Description: Portlet that displays a clickable google map. Supports 2012.2 and higher versions of Cache. Improvements compared to %DeepSee.Component.Widget.map: 1) Polygon support. In addition to markers, this widget supports clickable colored polygons with tooltips. The "coordsProperty" widget setting should be set to the name of a data source property that provides polygon coordinates. The value of this property is expected to contain one or more ordered sequences of coordinates each of which designates a closed loop. Sequences are delimited by ; (semicolon). Coordinates in such a sequence are delimited by spaces, for example: 42.725042,55.257428,0 42.727162,55.270206,0 42.737196,55.27019,0 42.725042,55.257428,0 Each coordinate triple consists of latitude / longitude numbers and a noWrap flag (see http://code.google.com/intl/en/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#LatLng for details). An alternative approach is to store polygon coordinates in a static js file rather than in the database. See coordsJsFile property description for details. 2) Configurable names of data source properties that provide marker and polygon data (latitude, longitude, color, opacity etc). 3) Configurable "onclick" handler for markers and polygons. Configurable "onaddpolygon" and "onaddmarker" handlers. 4) Drilldown capabilities. 5) Convenience javascript methods: createInfoWindowAtPosition() and getControl().

Property.name: latitude
Property.Description: Initial latitude (as a decimal number).

Property.name: longitude
Property.Description: Initial longitude (as a decimal number).

Property.name: zoom
Property.Description: Initial zoom level (0 shows entire globe).

Property.name: mapType
Property.Description: Initial map display.

Property.name: markersDraggable
Property.Description: If true, then the markers on this map are draggable.

Property.name: latitudeProperty
Property.Description: Name of property in data source that provides the latitude value for a marker.

Property.name: longitudeProperty
Property.Description: Name of property in data source that provides the longitude value for a marker.

Property.name: coordsProperty
Property.Description: Name of property in data source that provides the coordinates array for a polygon.

Property.name: colorProperty
Property.Description: Name of property in data source that provides the color of a polygon.

Property.name: onclickmarker
Property.Description: onclickmarker event handler: if defined, this event is fired when a marker is clicked.

Property.name: onrightclickmarker
Property.Description: onrightclickmarker event handler: if defined, this event is fired when a marker is clicked.

Property.name: onclickpolygon
Property.Description: onclickpolygon event handler: if defined, this event is fired when a polygon is clicked.

Property.name: onrightclickpolygon
Property.Description: onrightclickpolygon event handler: if defined, this event is fired when a polygon is clicked.

Property.name: markerTitleProperty
Property.Description: Name of property in data source that provides the title of a marker (used for tooltip text).

Property.name: polygonTitleProperty
Property.Description: Name of property in data source that provides the title of a polygon (used for tooltip text).

Property.name: markerDataProperties
Property.Description: List of properties in data source that provides data to be stored within the current marker. This data is visible from onclick event handler.

Property.name: polygonDataProperties
Property.Description: List of properties in data source that provides data to be stored within the current polygon. This data is visible from onclick event handler.

Property.name: ondrilldown
Property.Description: ondrilldown event handler: if defined, this event is fired from drillDown() method.

Property.name: ondrillup
Property.Description: ondrillup event handler: if defined, this event is fired from drillUp() method.

Property.name: fillOpacityProperty
Property.Description: Name of property in data source that provides polygon fill opacity.

Property.name: isClickableProperty
Property.Description: Name of property in data source that provides "сlickable" attribute value for markers and polygons.

Property.name: hoverOpacity
Property.Description: Hover opacity for clickable polygons.

Property.name: strokeOpacity
Property.Description: Polygon stroke opacity.

Property.name: strokeWeight
Property.Description: Polygon stroke weight.

Property.name: fillOpacity
Property.Description: Default fillOpacity for polygons.

Property.name: markerIconProperty
Property.Description: Name of property in data source that provides icon href for markers.

Property.name: markerIcon
Property.Description: Default marker icon href.

Property.name: markerSpecialIcon
Property.Description: Special marker icon href. [+]

Property.name: markerSpecialProperty
Property.Description: Special marker property [+]

Property.name: markerIconSize
Property.Description: Marker icon size (ignored if both markerIcon and markerIconProperty are not set).

Property.name: onapplyfilters
Property.Description: onapplyfilters event handler

Property.name: onaddpolygon
Property.Description: onaddpolygon event handler

Property.name: onaddmarker
Property.Description: onaddmarker event handler

Property.name: coordsJsFile
Property.Description: JS file containing "function loadCoordinates(polygonCoordsArray) {}" that populates a polygon coordinates associative array. If <var>coordsJsFile</var> is specified then <var>coordsProperty</var> must contain name of the property that provides keys for the coordinates associative array.

Property.name: drillUpButtonPosition
Property.Description: Where "<< Back" button is located
